biotools.summary: Population-level genome-wide STR typing in Plasmodium species reveals higher resolution population structure and genetic diversity relative to SNP typing. PlasmoSTR contains population and genome-wide information about genetic variation and other characteristics of short tandem repeats (STRs) in Plasmodium falciparum and Plasmodium vivax.

bioschemas.name: PlasmoSTR
